channel.title: JonDonym + Tor routing
channel.description:
My basic idea is to add an extra layer of anonymity and safety! I'm not really experienced with networking related stuff so can some please explain why the following would not work or would not add safety and anonymity.
User -> JonDonym -> Tor -> Website
In theory and in my mind it should increase anonymity because for example if the 1st and 3rd node are malicious and you trace the traffic back you would also have to trace the JonDonym traffic back, so you would have 2 layers.
Is there any way to make that work? and what would be the drawbacks except the speed?

item.title: JonDonym + Tor routing
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Hello, welcome to Whonix forums and thank you for your question!

nklbzr:

can some please explain why the following would not work or would not add safety and anonymity.

see:

whonix.org – 22 Mar 20

Combining Tunnels with Tor - Whonix

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User → Tor → proxy/VPN/SSH → Internet) (User → proxy/VPN/SSH → Tor → Internet)

Also this question should be solved as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle since it’s unspecific to Whonix if combination of Tor and JonDonym is useful or not

nklbzr:

and what would be the drawbacks except the speed?

Also this question should be solved as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle since it’s unspecific to Whonix if combination of Tor and JonDonym is useful or not.

Closing this thread to avoid Tor + XYZ combination theoretic discussions.

If you decide to do this and the question of how please create a separate forum thread.

nklbzr:

Is there any way to make that work?

whonix.org – 21 Dec 19

Combining Whonix ™ with JonDonym - Whonix

Combining Whonix ™ with JonDonym. JonDonym over Tor. Connecting to Tor before JonDonym (User → Tor → JonDonym → Internet ) OR Connecting to JonDonym before Tor (User → JonDonym → Tor → Internet ).

Generally, please use search engines first. Entering “JonDonym Tor” or “JonDonym Whonix” into any search engine will show this website.

Read full topic
